divs: Sighting DetailsI was a teen-ager in the 1950's going to mail a letter at a local mail box it was a very clear night with the stars out I looked up to see a domed disc very high up hovering for about 5 or so minutes with a green stripe down the center it then departed very very fast sideways.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Maple Heights
There were no other sightings in Maple Heights on or around July 15th 1954
